channel.title: Giampaolo Rodola - wheels
channel.description: Python enthusiast, core developer, psutil author

item.title: Wheels for free-threaded Python now available in psutil
item.description: With the release of psutil 7.1.2, wheels for free-threaded Python are now available. This milestone was achieved largely through a community effort, as several internal refactorings to the C code were required to make it possible (see issue #2565). Many of these changes were contributed by Lysandros Nikolaou …
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola

item.title: psutil 2.1.2 and Python wheels
item.description: psutil 2.1.2 is out. This release has been cooking for a while now, and that's because I've been travelling for the past 3 months between Spain, Japan and Germany. Hopefully I will be staying in Berlin for a while now, so I will have more time to dedicate …
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
